Use Case Information

checkReservationId: will check the users reservation id
checkSeatNum: will check the users plane seat Number
checkFlightNumber: will check the users flight number
getReservation: will get the users reservation
checkInPassenger: will allow the user to check into their flight
getPassenger: will get the passenger who has a certain reservation or who needs to be checked in
scanPostCard: allows the user to scan a postcard
scanSpecialMenu: allows the user to scan a special meal list
displayReportMenu: allows the user to submit a report on how their experience was based on multiple reports
qualifiesForReport: whether or not this report qualifies
getQualifications: get the user qualification
printRecord: print the report that was submitted
